entry.title: Raw Moringa Leaf Powder Capsules (Pure, Vegan & Organic) | Moringa Life
entry.summary:
Vendor: Moringa Life
Type: Supplements
Price: 126.50

Moringa Life's Raw Moringa Leaf Powder Capsules (120 vegan caps) is a potent, concentrated all-round healer for optimal health, and prevention and treatment of illness.

  • Moringa Oleifera is widely used as a super food for its high nutritional value, with a higher concentration of vitamins and minerals than most other plants
  • Contains 92 nutrients, 46 antioxidants, 36 anti-inflammatories, 18 amino acids, 9 essential amino acids
  • Contains 2 x more protein than yoghurt, 3 x more potassium than bananas, 4 x more calcium than milk, 4 x more Vitamin A than carrots, 7 x more Vitamin C than oranges
  • Used for "tired blood" (anemia), arthritis and other joint pain, asthma, cancer, constipation, diabetes, diarrhea, epilepsy, stomach pain, ulcers, intestinal spasms, headaches, heart problems, high blood pressure, kidney stones, fluid retention, thyroid problems, bacterial infections, fungal infections, viral infections, parasitic infections and muscle recovery
  • Moringa is also used to reduce swelling, boost the immune system, increase breastmilk production, reduce inflammation, and increase mental alertness
  • No negative side effects associated with Moringa Oleifera use
  • 100% vegan, soy-free, 100% organic, non-GMO, 100% natural (no additives), gluten-free and dairy-free!

Ingredients

Moringa Leaf Powder in vegan capsule

The benefits of continuous intake of Moringa

  • Increases the natural defences of the body
  • Provides nourishment to the eyes and the brain
  • Promotes metabolism with bio-available ingredients
  • Promotes the cell structure of the body
  • Promotes natural serum cholesterol
  • Promotes the normal functioning of the liver and the kidney
  • Promotes energy
  • Promotes proper digestion
  • Acts as an antioxidant
  • Takes care of the immune system of the body
  • Promotes healthy circulatory system
  • It is an anti-inflammatory
  • Gives a feeling of general wellness
  • Supports the normal sugar levels of the body
  • Promotes good sleep
  • Encourages soft, clear skin

entry.title: Country Butter Rusks 500g | Camphill Village
entry.summary:
Vendor: Camphill Village
Type: Health food
Price: 62.50

Camphill Village West Coast's Country Butter Rusks (500g) is sustainably-sourced and made by a local community for intellectually-challenged adults.

  • This is a wholesome snack packed with crunchy, yummy taste using stone-ground flour, a wide selection of seeds and nuts, honey, cultured butter and free range eggs
  • Contains no preservatives using only wholesome goodness 
  • The revenue that is made from these sales goes towards sustaining Camphill Village West Coast (a sustainable, socially-uplifting community established for intellectually challenged adults)
  • Support local, support community and support our planet!

Ingredients 

Stone-ground wheat flour, farm cultured milk, farm butter, sugar, bran 16%, oats, coconut, free range eggs, sunflower seeds, linseeds, sesame seeds, pumpkin seeds, baking powder, salt.

Why we support Camphill Village

The revenue that is made from these sales goes towards sustaining Camphill Village West Coast. Camphill Village cares about the environment, sustainability and future generations to come!

Camphill Village West Coast is a sustainable, socially-uplifting community established for intellectually challenged adults, to provide them with the opportunity to live with purpose and dignity. Located on a farm (40 km north of Cape Town), Camphill is set in a natural farm setting where the residents work in a bakery, dairy, herbal workshop, farm and vegetable gardens to produce quality goods for sale.

entry.title: FLAXi Heat Therapy Bags (Pack of 8 Mixed Designs) - SAVE 10%
entry.summary:
Vendor: FLAXi Bag
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 893.00

FLAXi's Heat Therapy Bags (pack of 8 mixed designs) are beautiful 100% cotton hand printed heat therapy bag for aches and pains.

  • 1 x Royal Blue Dots design, 1 x Red Orange Dots design, 1 x Chartreuse Green Dots design, 1 x Charcoal Dots design, 1 x Royal Blue Foliage design, 1 x Red Orange Foliage design, 1 x Chartreuse Green Foliage design, 1 x Charcoal Foliage design
  • Natural heat therapy bags for aches and pains
  • Provides targeted pain relief for conditions such as arthritis, muscular pain, PMS, back pain, restless leg syndrome, tension, fibromyalgia, rheumatic disease, headaches and more
  • Bags made from natural cotton, hand-crafted in South Africa
  • Designed for use as a hot or cold compress (microwavable/chill it in the freezer for a cold compress)
  • Retains heat for up to 40 minutes at a time
  • Filled with food-grade Flaxseed and organic Cape Lavender

How to use

Heat Therapy: Place your FLAXi Bag in the microwave on high for 2 minutes, and place the bag over the affected area.

Cold Compress: Place the FLAXi Bag in a sealed freezer bag and place in freezer for approximately 30 minutes. Place the bag over the affected area.

Care Instructions:

  • To clean your FLAXi Bag, gently dab the bag with a damp sponge. Do not wash or immerse in water!
  • Store your FLAXi Bag in a sealed container, to preserve the lavender fragrance.
  • Replace your FLAXi Bag every year or so.

Caution: Do not heat the FLAXi Bag for more than 3 minutes in the microwave. Should your FLAXi Bag get burned in the  microwave, dispose of it.

entry.title: Flaxseed & Lavender Heat Therapy Bag (Apricot Rainbows) | FLAXiToddler
entry.summary:
Vendor: FLAXi Bag
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 90.00

FLAXi's Apricot Rainbows Heat Therapy Bag is a beautifully 100% cotton flannel hand printed heat therapy bag for toddlers' bumps, bruises, growing pains, fevers and sleep issues.

  • Natural heat therapy bag for aches and pains
  • Removable and washable cover
  • Bag made from 100% natural cotton flannel inner bag filled with linseed and lavender, hand-crafted in South Africa
  • Designed for use as a hot or cold compress (microwavable/chill it in the freezer for a cold compress)
  • Retains heat for up to 40 minutes at a time
  • Filled with food-grade Flaxseed and organic Cape Lavender
  • Size: 100x200mm

How to use

Heat Therapy: Place your FLAXi Bag in the microwave on high for 2 minutes, and place the bag over the affected area.

Cold Compress: Place the FLAXi Bag in a sealed freezer bag and place in freezer for approximately 30 minutes. Place the bag over the affected area.

Care Instructions:

  • To clean your FLAXi Bag, remove the external bag and gently dab the bag with a damp sponge. Do not wash or immerse in water!
  • Store your FLAXi Bag in a sealed container, to preserve the lavender fragrance.
  • Replace your FLAXi Bag every year or so.

Caution: Do not heat the FLAXi Bag for more than 3 minutes in the microwave. Should your FLAXi Bag get burned in the  microwave, dispose of it.

How to use

Heat Therapy: Place your FLAXi Bag in the microwave on high for 2 minutes, and place the bag over the affected area.

Cold Compress: Place the FLAXi Bag in a sealed freezer bag and place in freezer for approximately 30 minutes. Place the bag over the affected area.

Care Instructions:

  • To clean your FLAXi Bag, remove the external bag and gently dab the bag with a damp sponge. Do not wash or immerse in water!
  • Store your FLAXi Bag in a sealed container, to preserve the lavender fragrance.
  • Replace your FLAXi Bag every year or so.

Caution: Do not heat the FLAXi Bag for more than 3 minutes in the microwave. Should your FLAXi Bag get burned in the  microwave, dispose of it.
